original_title: 2023 Grade five scholarship exam: Cut-off marks released
original_body_lines: Colombo, Feb 2 (Daily Mirror) - The Examinations Department today released the cut-off marks for the enrolment of students into Grade Six next year, based on the 2023 Grade 5 Scholarship Examination.
Also, the students are requested to enter their correct examination numbers to obtain the results.
Cut-off marks according to the district basis for Sinhala and tamil medium students are as follows:
